products.name: Fresh Tomatoes
products.description: Fresh, juicy tomatoes handpicked from local farms. Perfect for salads, cooking, and making sauces. Rich in vitamins and antioxidants.

products.name: Organic Bananas
products.description: Premium quality organic bananas. Rich in potassium and natural energy. Perfect for smoothies and healthy snacking.

products.name: Fresh Milk
products.description: Pure and fresh full cream milk. Pasteurized and homogenized for safety. Rich in calcium and protein.

products.name: Whole Wheat Bread
products.description: Freshly baked whole wheat bread. Made with 100% whole grain flour. High in fiber and nutrients.

products.name: Potato Chips
products.description: Crispy and delicious potato chips. Made from premium quality potatoes. Perfect for parties and snacking.

products.name: Orange Juice
products.description: 100% pure orange juice with no added sugar. Freshly squeezed and packed with vitamin C.

products.name: Fresh Carrots
products.description: Crunchy and sweet carrots. Rich in beta-carotene and fiber. Great for salads, juices, and cooking.

products.name: Red Apples
products.description: Crisp and sweet red apples. Imported premium quality. Rich in antioxidants and dietary fiber.

products.name: Greek Yogurt
products.description: Thick and creamy Greek yogurt. High in protein and probiotics. Perfect for breakfast and smoothies.

products.name: Chocolate Cookies
products.description: Delicious chocolate chip cookies. Freshly baked with premium chocolate. Perfect with tea or coffee.

products.name: Onions
products.description: Fresh red onions. Essential ingredient for cooking. Rich in antioxidants and vitamins.

products.name: Mangoes
products.description: Sweet and juicy Alphonso mangoes. King of fruits. Rich in vitamins A and C.

products.name: Cheddar Cheese
products.description: Premium aged cheddar cheese. Perfect for sandwiches, burgers, and pasta. Rich and creamy taste.

products.name: Croissants
products.description: Buttery and flaky croissants. Freshly baked every morning. Perfect for breakfast.

products.name: Nachos
products.description: Crunchy corn nachos. Perfect for dips and parties. Made with premium corn.

products.name: Green Tea
products.description: Premium green tea leaves. Rich in antioxidants. Helps in weight management and boosts metabolism.

products.name: Bell Peppers
products.description: Colorful bell peppers. Rich in vitamins and antioxidants. Perfect for salads and stir-fry.

products.name: Strawberries
products.description: Fresh and sweet strawberries. Rich in vitamin C and antioxidants. Perfect for desserts.

products.name: Butter
products.description: Creamy salted butter. Made from pure milk cream. Perfect for cooking and baking.

products.name: Muffins
products.description: Delicious blueberry muffins. Freshly baked with real blueberries. Perfect for breakfast.
